verbose_text: To further explore the molecular signature of rhesus spermatogonia, we evaluated the expression of VASA (pan germ cell marker), as well as GFRalpha1, PLZF and NGN3, consensus markers of stem and progenitor spermatogonia in rodents in sections of paraformaldehyde fixed juvenile testes.
evidence: expression of VASA (pan germ cell marker), as well as GFRalpha1, PLZF and NGN3
